sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new user in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Users' section and you will be navigated to the 'Users' page.
On the 'Users' page, click on the '+' icon located at the top right corner.

A pop-up will appear containing several fields. These fields include: 'Full Name' (input), 'Username' (input), 'Designation' (input), 'User Email' (input), 'Password' (input), 'Mobile No' (input), 'Check In Radius' (input), 'Select Access Type' (dropdown list), 'Select Role Access Area' (dropdown list), 'Select Sector' (dropdown list), 'Select Access Group' (dropdown list), 'Status' (dropdown list), 'Is Location Locked' (dropdown list), 'Can Approve Journey' (dropdown list), and 'Can Mark Attendance?' (dropdown list). Fill in the required fields with the appropriate options and click the 'Add' button.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new agent in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Agents' section and you will be navigated to the 'Agents' page.
Click on the '+' icon located next to the 'View Detail' button.

A pop-up containing multiple fields will appear. On the left side of the pop-up, there are four sections: Employee Registration, Employee Settings, Restrictions, and App Permissions. Each section contains required fields. Enter the necessary data in each section, starting from Employee Registration through to App Permissions. Once completed, click the 'Add' button to save the agent.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new PJP in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'PJP' section and you will be navigated to the 'PJP' page.
Click on the '+' icon located next to the 'Get PJP' button.

A pop-up will appear with six fields on the 'PJP' page. The fields are: 'Select Distributor' (dropdown), 'Select Agent' (dropdown), 'Select Week(s)' (dropdown), 'Select Day(s)' (dropdown), 'Select Section(s)' (dropdown), and 'Select Sector(s)' (dropdown). Select the appropriate values and click 'Add'.

sections.description: This section guides the user through adding a new access group in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Access Group' section and you will be navigated to the 'Access Group' page.
On the 'Access Group' page, click on the '+' icon located at the top right corner.

A pop-up will appear with two fields. The fields are: 'Access Group Name' (input) and 'Status' (dropdown). Enter the name of the access group in the 'Access Group Name' field, choose the status (Active/Inactive), and then click the 'Add' button.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching for a user in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Users' section and you will be navigated to the 'Users' page.
On the 'Users' page, click on the 'Search' icon located at the top left corner.
Type the user you want to search for. If it exists, it will be displayed.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching for an access group in the system.

steps.description: Click on the 'Access Group' section and you will be navigated to the 'Access Group' page.
On the 'Access Group' page, click on the 'Search' icon located at the top left corner.
Type the access group name you want to search for. If it exists, it will be displayed.

sections.description: This section guides the user through viewing agent targets based on selected fields.

steps.description: Click on the 'Agent Targets' section and you will be navigated to the 'Agent Targets' page.
Select the Distributor, Agent, and Type from the dropdowns as required.
Click on the 'View Details' button to display the records based on the selected fields.

sections.description: This section guides the user through viewing agent based on selected fields.

steps.description: Click on the 'Agent' section and you will be navigated to the 'Agent' page.
Select the Distributor, then click on 'View Detail' to load the agent records.
If the agent exists, it will appear in the results.

sections.description: This section guides the user through searching the PJP based on selected fields.

steps.description: Click on the 'PJP' section and you will be navigated to the 'PJP' page.
Select the 'Distributor', 'Agent', 'Week(s)', 'Day(s)', 'Section(s)', and 'Sector(s)' from the dropdown lists as required.
Click on the 'Get PJP' button to display the 'PJP' records based on the selected fields.
